channel.title: I port forwarded but my client still wont go online? please help me!:D
channel.description:
Hey i portforwarded my client and im sure i did it right... (i got Bt Homehub) but when i try to connect to my server it still says "Error connecting to server" Please help me as i really want to get it online asap..:D All help apreasiated:)
Jake :)

item.title: I port forwarded but my client still wont go online? please help me!:D
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

I was being sarcastic, you cannot portforward your client since it connects and not receives anything.
Youc an only portforward your router, which is needed to play

item.title: I port forwarded but my client still wont go online? please help me!:D
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

Go into your router, click game sharing then new game ad enter the port needed… and thats is… May change abit depending on your router
www.portfowards.com[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2009, 09:32:28 am[/size][hr]sorry wrong site, this is the site for help - PortForward.com - Free Help Setting up Your Router or Firewall
